name: smart-study-platform
description: Smart Study Platform - A platform for sharing and accessing study materials

scripts.db:create: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { exec } = require('child_process'); exec(`mysql -u ${process.env.DB_USER}${process.env.DB_PASSWORD ? ` -p${process.env.DB_PASSWORD}` : ''} -e 'CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS ${process.env.DB_NAME} CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci;'\`, (error) => { if (error) { console.error(' Error creating database:', error.message); process.exit(1); } console.log(' Database created successfully'); });"
scripts.db:drop: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { exec } = require('child_process'); exec(`mysql -u ${process.env.DB_USER}${process.env.DB_PASSWORD ? ` -p${process.env.DB_PASSWORD}` : ''} -e 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS ${process.env.DB_NAME}'\`, (error) => { if (error) { console.error(' Error dropping database:', error.message); process.exit(1); } console.log(' Database dropped successfully'); });"
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
